summary: Ice of Skyrim is an attempt to re-texture Ice Formations of Skyrim such as Icicles and Glaciers.
descriptionHtml:
Ice of Skyrim is an attempt to re-texture Ice Formations
of Skyrim such as Icicles and Glaciers.

I do not claim this to be anything "great", it is simply
something to add to the game and I find visually appealing.

"Glacier Alpha Meshes SEE README" folder contains the meshes
for Glaciers. Ice Floes, and Icebergs with Alpha enabled.

See NOTE below however!

To install them, extract the meshes folder to your Skyrim\Data
folder and choose yes to overwrite old files.

** NOTE **

If you install the Glacier Alphas Meshes and run into issues with
Glacier/Iceberg Textures disappearing, please revert back to default
meshes!

I use [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=296]Nicer Snowflakes[/url] by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1904836]evercharmer[/url]
(incase anyone wonders about any snowflakes that may appear on screens from time to time)

Current Permissions:
Permission granted to papill6n to use glacierslab.dds from Ice of Skyrim for
[url=http://planetelderscrolls.gamespy.com/View.php?view=Mods.Detail&id=8987]Morrowind Overhaul - Sounds & Graphics[/url]
author: Crypton
